title: Safe Social Network For Children Technology
text: Questions Business Summary THE OFFICIEL VERSION OF THE WILBY.TV SITE WAS LAUNCHED IN 2011 AND HAS QUICKLY GAINED NOROTIETY AT THE INTERNATIONAL LEVEL. A NUMBER OF MEDIAS POSITION IT AS ''THE SAFE FACEBOOK FOR KIDS''. To accelerate its international expansion, WILBY inc. has implemented a strategically designed Affiliate program for entrepreneurs/companies who wish to commercialise the WILBY social network platform and brand products in their country. We actually are looking to find Affiliates for the USA, Mexico, South America, Europe, Asia, Middle East and Africa. WHAT MAKES A GOOD AFFILIATE FOR WILBY INC. A partner interested in becoming an Affiliate must first demonstrate that it possesses all the skills, expertise, corporate structure and resources necessary to be an effective Wilby Affiliate. REVENUE MODEL WILBY offers a diversified and recurrent revenue model for the Affiliate in its territory: - % of all revenue from Privilege Members in its region; - % of all advertising revenue and other marketing revenue from advertisers in its region; - % of all sales of the WILBY BRAND derivative products in its region; The Affiliate can enjoy a highly profitable revenue stream depending on the number of members and partners who join WILBY.TV in its region. Membership is cumulative, so revenue increases exponentially every year. AFFILIATE LICENSE Licence cost depends of the territory, expected commercialisation and marketing investments needed, corporate structure and notoriety already established by the affiliate. The affiliate benefits from a turnkey solution: - Innovative Web/Mobile social network and communications platform technology; - Advises / support to organize an effective marketing plan tailored to its region; - Training on applicable sales techniques, marketing and promotion; - All necessary promotional tools; - Powerful Brand (WILBY) / Or White Label option Financials
